summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Beach Drive, as established by condemnation, from the south line of Seashore Park 2nd Addition, to West Juneau Street; by grading and curbing and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7501 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
